import{useEffect}from"react";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";//useParams
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Detail(){const{id}=useParams();//useParams, App.js에서 url이 받는 변수(id) 값을 넘겨줌
const getMovie=async()=>{const json=await(await fetch("https://yts.mx/api/v2/movie_details.json?movie_id=".concat(id))).json();//id를 알고 있으니까 API로부터 detail 정보를 fetch해 올 수 있음
console.log(json);};useEffect(()=>{getMovie();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Detail"});}export default Detail;
